title: ProShares UltraPro QQQ ETF Options Spot-On: On December 1st, 199.86K Contracts Were Traded, With 2 Million Open Interest
summary: On December 1st, the ProShares UltraPro QQQ ETF (TQQQ.US) experienced active options trading, with 199.86K contracts traded. Put options slightly edged out call options, and the open interest reached approximately 2 million contracts, significantly higher than the 30-day average. A notable unusual trade involved a put option at a $52.25 strike price expiring on December 5th, 2025.

title: Investing with options: hedging the Nasdaq 100
summary: This article explores options hedging strategies, specifically long puts on QQQ and a debit put spread on NDX, as practical solutions for investors to protect portfolio gains against market volatility. It provides a comparative analysis of these strategies under various market scenarios, guiding investors towards efficient capital protection. The piece details the mechanisms, costs, and potential benefits of each strategy, concluding with a comparative table and advice on choosing the appropriate hedge.

title: Should You Buy the Invesco QQQ ETF With the Nasdaq At An All-Time High? History Offers a Clear Answer.
summary: This article discusses the Invesco QQQ ETF and whether it's a good investment despite the Nasdaq Composite being at an all-time high. It analyzes historical data of the Nasdaq's performance after reaching new highs, suggesting that further gains are common. The article concludes that dollar-cost averaging into QQQ is a sensible strategy regardless of market highs, as it tracks the Nasdaq 100 which tends to rise over time.

title: Invesco Nasdaq 100 ETF: Stash This ETF Away In Your Roth IRA (NASDAQ:QQQM)
summary: This article recommends investing in the Invesco Nasdaq 100 ETF (QQQM) for a Roth IRA, especially given market turmoil. The author highlights why QQQM was chosen over the more common QQQ and discusses its appeal after significant price declines in quality tech stocks like Apple, Amazon, and Microsoft. The author also mentions a collaboration with Hoya Capital for an income-focused investing service.

title: Billionaire George Soros reveals stake in Rivian, sells some tech shares
summary: Billionaire George Soros' investment fund, Soros Fund Management, acquired a significant stake in electric-pickup maker Rivian Automotive Inc., purchasing nearly 20 million shares worth approximately $2 billion in Q4. This move was disclosed in a recent SEC filing. At the same time, Soros' fund also trimmed positions in major tech companies like Amazon and Alphabet.

title: The Invesco QQQ Stock Price Is Up 23.7% Since January. Could There Be More Gains?
summary: The Invesco QQQ Trust (NASDAQ: QQQ) has seen its stock price rise 23.7% since January, driven by major tech companies like Apple and Google, despite recent pullbacks. Investors are closely watching the Federal Reserve's monetary policy meeting for potential hawkish policies that could further impact the Nasdaq index and the QQQ ETF. While the ETF is currently in a downtrend, its present stock price may be attractive for a future rally, though a clear upward trend based on EMA crossings is yet to materialize.

title: March Madness Ads Spur Huge One-Day Inflow to NCAA’s Invesco ETF
summary: Invesco's QQQ Trust Series 1 ETF experienced its largest one-day inflow since 2000, totaling $4.9 billion, shortly after the 2021 NCAA men's basketball tournament began. While other market factors were at play, RSM US chief economist Joe Brusuelas suggests that Invesco's prominent March Madness advertising campaign, targeting a new class of pandemic-era investors, contributed significantly to this surge. This success could lead to more asset managers using sports as a marketing platform for investment products.

title: QQQ - Invesco Capital Management Llc - Invesco Qqq Trust Series 1 Quote, Price, Charts & News
summary: This article provides a real-time quote for the Invesco QQQ Trust Series 1 (QQQ), showing its current price and daily increase. It highlights key market indices like SPX, Dow 30, QQQ, and VIX with their respective performance. The page serves as a stock summary for QQQ provided by CMLViz.com.

title: Get Long Alibaba Stock Into Earnings With Confidence
summary: This article suggests investors consider going long on Alibaba (BABA) stock, despite market volatility and potential risks like U.S.-China rhetoric. It highlights BABA's strong recovery post-quarantine and its status as a superstar stock, comparable to other tech giants. The author recommends using options strategies, specifically selling puts, to enter positions with managed risk ahead of earnings.

title: U.S. Stocks, ETFs Bounce Back After China Trade Negotiations Stabilize
summary: U.S. stocks and ETFs are recovering losses after President Trump signaled a de-escalation in trade tensions with China. This positive shift follows statements from China's Vice Premier Liu He expressing willingness to negotiate and welcome U.S. investment, leading to upticks in major ETFs like SPY, XLF, and QQQ. Both sides—President Trump and Vice Premier Liu He—expressed optimism that trade talks are back on track.

title: Invesco QQQ Trust celebrates its 20 year anniversary
summary: Martin Flanagan, CEO of Invesco, and Adena Friedman, CEO of the Nasdaq, discussed the 20th anniversary of the Invesco QQQ Trust. The discussion highlights the significance of this milestone for the ETF and its impact on the market.
